valhelsia.first_start_message: Ye 'ave startin' points available t' spend on skills, open the skill menu t' assign 'em (K by default).
valhelsia.config.no_permission: Ye do nah 'ave permission t' use this command.
valhelsia.config.syntax: Syntax: Get config entry: !config [option]. Set config entry: !config [option] [entry]
valhelsia.advancement_levels.awarded_pro: Ye 'ave plundered %d progress towards yer next level.
valhelsia.mob_scarecrow_tooltip: Scares off all landlubbers within 8 blocks o' th' ragamuffin.
valhelsia.creeper_scarecrow_plushie_tool: Scares off creepers within 8 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.creeper_scarecrow_statue_toolt: Scares off creepers within 8 blocks o' th' statue.
valhelsia.skeleton_scarecrow_plushie_too: Scares off bags o' bones within 8 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.skeleton_scarecrow_statue_tool: Scares off bags o' bones within 8 blocks o' th' statue.
valhelsia.spider_scarecrow_plushie_toolt: Scares off spiders within 8 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.spider_scarecrow_statue_toolti: Scares off spiders within 8 blocks o' th' statue.
valhelsia.zombie_scarecrow_plushie_toolt: Scares off undead sailors within 8 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.zombie_scarecrow_statue_toolti: Scares off undead sailors within 8 blocks o' th' statue.
valhelsia.turtle_scarecrow_plushie_toolt: Attracts undead sailors within 24 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.turtle_scarecrow_statue_toolti: Attracts undead sailors within 24 blocks o' th' statue.
valhelsia.endermite_scarecrow_plushie_to: Attracts endermen within 24 blocks o' th' plushie.
valhelsia.endermite_scarecrow_statue_too: Attracts endermen within 24 blocks o' th' statue.
